Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to System Management->Reports->Report Run Request
Test Steps.Step Expected: Report Run Request Search Page must be displayed\n\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Add"
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.Select Report Definition ID 'DISTRICT-PRECINCT-MAPPING-LIST-REPORT'\n\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Select Region and click  on Template
Test Steps.Step Expected: Template parameters must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter the required parameters and select "MS Excel" for Output type Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: "Report run request has been created" message must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify the generated new report request on Report Run Request Search Page
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must generate a new report request id with status  "completed"

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on Actions->Download
Test Steps.Step Expected: The MS Excel report must be successfully generated on the local system

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify below column names are displayed on the report
County Code
County Name
District Type	
District Code	
District Name	
Precinct	
Total Voters
Test Steps.Step Expected: All the columns must be displayed correctly

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify all the Column values are displayed correctly on the report
County Code
County Name
District Type	
District Code	
District Name	
Precinct	
Total Voters
Test Steps.Step Expected: The values displayed in the report must match those shown in the EMS system

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify  the report data for the selected region correctly displays 
County Code
County Name
District Type	
District Code	
District Name	
Precinct	
Total Voters
Test Steps.Step Expected: The values displayed in the report must match those shown in the EMS system for the selected region.

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to System Management->Reports->Report Run Request
Test Steps.Step Expected: Report Run Request Search Page must be displayed\n\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Add"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Select Report Definition ID 'DISTRICT-PRECINCT-MAPPING-LIST-REPORT'

Test Steps.Step Action: Select Region and click  on Template
Test Steps.Step Expected: Template parameters must be displayed\n\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter the required parameters and select "PDF" for Output type Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: "Report run request has been created" message must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the ID Hyperlink on Report Run Request Search Page
Test Steps.Step Expected: PDF Report must be generated successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Date displayed  correctly on PDF Report1.date MM/DD/YYYY format.
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.date must be displayed in MM/DD/YYYY format.\n2.Left aligned on the report

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify that the name of the PDF report is displayed correctly on the report\n User name
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.Must be displayed as Generated by :"User name"\n2.Right aligned on the report

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify that the name of the PDF report is displayed correctly on the report\n "State of <client>"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must Display "Civix" in QA_Base\nTexas in QA Texas Environment\nIOWA in IA Environment

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify that the name of the PDF report is displayed correctly on the report\n <current Region>
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.Must be displayed below Generated by column and right aligned.\n2.Must display the region name which is selected on Template

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify that the name of the PDF report is displayed correctly on the report\n  <Name of the Report>
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.Must display as "Districts List" for 'DISTRICT-PRECINCT-MAPPING-LIST-REPORT'\n2.Must display as "Voter List" for VOTER-LIST-REPORT\n3.Must display as "Precinct List" for PRECINCT-DISTRICT-MAPPING-LIST-REPORT
